title: Add 'Learn more about us' button in homepage About section linking to About page

requirements.text: Add a new button labeled "Learn more about us" within the homepage About section (component: frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproachSection.tsx) and place it within the About / Firm Overview block so it appears after the overview text content.

quotes: Add a learn more about us button in the about section on the homepage. It should redirect to the existing about page

acceptanceCriteria: On the homepage, the About section displays a visible button with the exact label "Learn more about us".
The button is located in the About / Firm Overview portion of the section (not the "Our Approach" grid).

requirements.text: Wire the new "Learn more about us" button to navigate to the existing About page route at "/about" using the app's client-side router navigation (import and use navigate from frontend/src/router/router.ts), without a full page reload.

quotes: It should redirect to the existing about page

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "Learn more about us" button navigates to the "/about" route and renders the existing AboutPage.
Navigation occurs via the SPA router (no full page refresh).
The URL becomes exactly "/about" after clicking the button.

requirements.text: Ensure the new button styling is consistent with existing call-to-action buttons in the app and includes basic accessibility support (keyboard focus visible, descriptive label text).

quotes: Add a learn more about us button in the about section on the homepage.

acceptanceCriteria: The button is reachable and clickable via keyboard (Tab + Enter/Space).
A visible focus style is present when the button is focused.
The button text is high-contrast and readable in both light and dark themes (no illegible text on background).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts (immutable paths).
Do not add new backend logic; the change should be frontend-only navigation/UI.
Keep the existing About page route registered at "/about" unchanged.
nonGoals: Creating a new About page or changing About page content.
Adding new backend endpoints, storage, or authentication changes.
Adding analytics/event tracking for the button click.
